ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Long downtime?
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFLMAO!!!! And just for the record, you can download the patch long before the servers go up (it s one of the first things they do) and read the patch
ygData.messageBody:
ROFLMAO!!!!

And just for the record, you can download the
patch long before the servers go up (it's one of
the first things they do) and read the patch
message... As far as when they'll come back up...
well, not to disillusion you or anything, but I
saw a supposed 5 hour patch last for 15 hours
before... Go take your dog for a walk or do some
laundry... the servers will be back up
eventually.

And just so you know, I'm friggin' dying for them
to come back up myself... I've had the Ring of
the Ancients for days (since Halloween!!) and
haven't been able to get my Jboots because of the
zone changes to Rathe Mountains... So you're not
alone in your desire to play, you just need to
learn to cope...

--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> *In his geriatric voice*
> "When I was young, we had to wait DAYS for the
> patch! During prime
> time! In the rain (which you couldn't see
> through because the clip-plane
> was broken!) Uphill. Both ways. With no SoW!
> And for what? Sure we had
> zones - two of 'em. In black and white. And
> only one mob. The mangy
> rat. People camped that rat for hours, and
> every kill-stole from everyone
> else. Not that it mattered. The rat only had 1
> copper for loot. And since
> everything cost at least a platinum, nobody
> could afford any good
> equipment. Not that there was any good
> equipment - just a rusty sword and
> a moss-covered twig...."
>
> *snicker*
>
>


=====
Kinrea Keres 49th Teir'dal Warrior <Swift Law Coalition>
Danallis Stormcaller 40th Half Elven Druid <SLC>
Sinarya L'achesis 26th Teir'dal Necromancer <SLC>
Lereny 14th Half Elven Bard <Trakanon's Vision>
Mayahna 9th Human Druid
